app.name: WitNote
app.description: WitNote is a privacy-focused local note-taking app with built-in AI assistant to help you organize thoughts, polish articles, and answer questions. All data is stored locally, and AI models can run completely offline.

sidebar.connectFolder: Connect a folder to start writing
sidebar.disconnectConfirm:
Are you sure you want to disconnect this folder?

‚ö†Ô∏è This will disconnect the app from the local folder, but will not delete any files in the folder.

All your notes and files will remain intact.
sidebar.disconnectMessage: This will disconnect the app from the local folder context, but will NOT delete any files.
sidebar.disconnectDetail: All your notes and files will remain safe locally.
sidebar.emptyGuide: Please click below to create or link a local folder as your data storage location

poem.title: Song of the Auspicious Clouds
poem.line1: How brilliant are the auspicious clouds
poem.line2: Winding and unfurling, vast and slow
poem.line3: The sun and moon, in glorious light
poem.line4: Day after day, renew their glow
poem.meta: ‚Äî Shangshu Dazhuan | c. 23rd Century BCE | Ancient China

editor.mdCheatSheet:
üëã **Welcome to Markdown Edit Mode!**

üí° Click **[ MD | TXT ]** to switch formats

---

## üìù Quick Reference

### Headers
`# Header` ‚Üí 
# Header

### Text Styles
`**bold**` ‚Üí **bold**

`*italic*` ‚Üí *italic*

`~~strikethrough~~` ‚Üí ~~strikethrough~~

### Lists
`- item` ‚Üí
- Item 1
- Item 2

`1. numbered` ‚Üí
1. First
2. Second

`- [x] done` ‚Üí
- [x] Done
- [ ] Todo

### Quote
`> quote` ‚Üí
> This is a quote

### Code
`` `code` `` ‚Üí `console.log('Hi')`

### Link
`[text](url)` ‚Üí [Click here](https://example.com)

### Divider
`---` ‚Üí

---

‚ú® Happy writing!

chat.thinkingModelHint: Thinking models do not support intelligent continuation. Response speed may be slow. Switching to another model is recommended.

settings.title: Settings
settings.smartConversionHint: When enabled, MD to TXT will remove Markdown markup; when disabled, content remains unchanged
settings.ollamaHint: Want a more powerful AI experience? Download
settings.ollamaHint2: and install larger local models (like Qwen, Llama, etc.)
settings.autoFallbackHint: When enabled, automatically switch to backup engine when preferred engine is unavailable
settings.defaultPromptHint: Defines the AI assistant's role and behavior. You can modify it freely, click 'Restore Default' to revert.
settings.customPromptHint: You can add extra prompts below, which will be prepended to the default prompt to further customize the AI's behavior.
settings.customPromptPlaceholder: e.g., Please respond in a more humorous way...
settings.builtInModelHint: This app includes the built-in qwen2.5:0.5b model, ready to use. You can also manually add other models to the models directory.

credits.note: This application uses the above open source components. Special thanks to the open source community for their contributions. All components follow their respective open source licenses.

guide.description: WitNote is a local-first AI writing companion. Supports switching between WebLLM / Ollama / Cloud API engines, paired with a minimalist native card interface. No cloud dependency, no privacy concerns ‚Äî intelligence made lightweight.
guide.descriptionWindows: WitNote is a local-first AI writing companion. Supports Ollama local engine and Cloud API, paired with a minimalist native card interface. No cloud dependency, no privacy concerns ‚Äî intelligence made lightweight.
guide.philosophySmartDesc: ‚Äî WebLLM (Built-in) / Ollama (Local) / Cloud API, three engines to choose freely
guide.philosophySmartDescWindows: ‚Äî Supports Ollama (Local) and Cloud API dual engines, switch freely
guide.philosophySimpleDesc: ‚Äî iOS-style card management; Focus Mode activates automatically when window narrows
guide.philosophySecureDesc: ‚Äî 100% local storage. Your thoughts belong only to you.
guide.step1Desc: Choose any local folder as your note library, supports .txt and .md, your data is completely free
guide.step2Desc: The AI assistant on the right directly reads your current content to help polish, complete, or summarize
guide.step3Desc: Try narrowing the window ‚Äî the editor automatically switches to a distraction-free minimal mode for pure writing
guide.webllmDesc: Lightweight model running in browser, ready to use, suitable for simple conversations

dialog.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete
dialog.deleteWarningMessage: Please carefully confirm what you want to delete.
dialog.deleteWarningDetail1: Items will be moved to system Trash
dialog.deleteWarningDetail2: You can recover deleted files from the Trash

onboarding.selectFolderPrompt: Please select a folder as your note library

roles.writerPrompt: You are a professional writing assistant. Help improve article structure, polish text, and enhance expression. Keep a concise and powerful style.
roles.novelistPrompt: You are a creative novel writing assistant. Good at plot development, character building, and atmosphere creation. Use vivid language to inspire imagination.
roles.diaryPrompt: You are a warm diary assistant. Help record life, organize thoughts, and reflect on growth. Be friendly and empathetic.
roles.translatorPrompt: You are a professional translation assistant. Expert in Chinese-English translation, focusing on context and natural fluency. Maintain original style and intent.
roles.learnerPrompt: You are a learning tutor assistant. Good at explaining concepts, summarizing key points, and providing study tips. Teach in easy-to-understand language.
roles.coderPrompt: You are a programming assistant. Help explain code, debug issues, and provide best practice advice. Keep code examples clean and standard.
roles.outdoorPrompt: You are an outdoor activity assistant. Provide hiking, camping, and travel advice with safety tips. Focus on practicality and safety.
roles.psychePrompt: You are a gentle mental support assistant. Listen to users, provide emotional support and positive guidance. Be respectful and patient.
roles.businessPrompt: You are a business writing assistant. Expert in emails, reports, and proposals. Use professional and appropriate language.
roles.creativePrompt: You are a creative inspiration assistant. Help brainstorm, spark creativity, and break conventional thinking. Boldly propose novel ideas.
roles.healthPrompt: You are a healthy living assistant. Provide exercise, diet, and lifestyle advice. Based on science, focused on practicality.
roles.chefPrompt: You are a cooking assistant. Share recipes, cooking techniques, and ingredient pairing suggestions. Clear steps, easy to follow.

autocomplete.title: Smart Autocomplete
autocomplete.useRolePromptHint: When enabled, autocomplete will follow the role prompt style above
autocomplete.promptHint: Customize the AI prompt for better suggestions
autocomplete.delayHint: Delay after typing stops before triggering (ms)
autocomplete.defaultPrompt: Default: Complete quotes/poems as original, use idiomatic expressions, otherwise continue naturally
autocomplete.promptLevelHint: Adjust prompt length based on model size: Lite for small models, Full for large models
autocomplete.promptLite: Continue the following text. Do not repeat existing content. Output new content directly.
autocomplete.promptStandard:
You are a continuation assistant. Continue writing from the very last character of the user's text.
Rules:
1. Do not repeat existing content
2. Complete quotes/poems accurately
3. Usually write just one sentence
autocomplete.promptFull:
You are a writing continuation assistant. The user will give you a passage, and you need to continue writing from after the very last character.

„ÄêMOST IMPORTANT RULE„Äë
- NEVER repeat any text the user provided! Your output should be entirely new content that immediately follows the user's text.
- The last few characters of the user's text mark where you should start. Write NEW content from that point on.

„ÄêOther Rules„Äë
1. Output only the new continuation, no explanations or prefixes
2. If you recognize famous quotes, poems, or idioms, complete them accurately
3. For fixed expressions like 'not only...but also...', complete idiomatically
4. Otherwise, continue naturally and smoothly, matching the context and style
5. Keep it concise, usually just one sentence
autocomplete.contextLengthHint: Text length read by AI before cursor. ~500 for small models, 2000+ for large models.
autocomplete.aiInsightHint: View details of the last AI completion
autocomplete.noInsightData: No data available. Trigger autocomplete to view.
